items.sentence: How long do you think it\'ll take you to finish writing this report?
Tom told Mary that she was the most beautiful woman he\'d ever seen.
Tom told me that he didn\'t recognize Mary the last time he saw her.
If you could travel to any country in the world, where would you go?
Many predictions were made, but none of those predictions came true.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary would really do something that dumb.
Mary tried to smuggle a hacksaw blade into the prison inside a cake.
Tom accomplished what we thought he wouldn\'t be able to accomplish.
It was obvious that Tom and Mary had strong feelings for each other.
It\'s important for the students to know what to expect on the test.
You\'ll probably find walking through that part of town interesting.
Tom has done things he doesn\'t want his children to find out about.
Tom hasn\'t been back to Boston since he graduated from high school.
Tom knew he didn\'t need to do what Mary told him needed to be done.
The blood alcohol limit for drunken driving is .08 percent in Texas.
Tom and Mary walked from early morning until it started to get dark.
Tom assured me that he would be here in time for the opening speech.
What makes you so sure Tom doesn\'t want to play basketball with us?
Tom and Mary fight more and more. I\'m afraid the honeymoon is over.
Tom can\'t deny the fact that he did what Mary accused him of doing.
